description: Loaded Wix Studio and resumed MezTal project.
Created CMS collections: services, industries, case_studies, resources, locations, people with appropriate fields.
Added text, rich content, image, and multi-reference fields to services, industries, and case_studies collections including meta titles and descriptions.
Completed resources collection with excerpt, body, author, and date fields and multi references; created people collection with role title, bio, and social links.
Verified Wix automatically generated dynamic list and item pages for each collection (services, industries, locations, case_studies, resources, and people).
Opened the Solutions dynamic list page, inserted a grid repeater and attempted to bind it to the services dataset.
Encountered difficulty binding the repeater to the dataset due to the Wix interface; removed unconfigured dataset to avoid duplicates.
Tried to commit session logs to GitHub using a personal access token via curl; received a 403 error indicating insufficient permissions.
Created local log files in /home/oai/share/tmp/logs/2025-11 for agent actions, errors, learning points, and actions CSV.
Finished tasks for the day; summarised progress and issues; ready for manual upload of logs to GitHub.
